Text.Page:
You've done all you can here, . Cross the planks and you'll be in the part of the grotto where the Red Lash leadership squats.

We've got scouts there—thanks to the disruptions you've already provided—and they might have seen this dementalith.

Talk to Ebosius. He usually knows what's up.

A dementalith? A big stone? I saw some of the little underlings take a big piece of stone downstairs about a month ago.

It tipped over and crushed one of them. Might be your dementalith.
